TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReturnValueNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ReturnValueNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ReturnValueNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定 Windows 运行时组件中方法的返回值名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the return value of a method in a Windows Runtime component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]的方法和返回值的所有参数，组件必须具有名称。In a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component, all the parameters of a method and the return value must have names. 默认情况下， [Winmdexp.exe （Windows 运行时元数据导出工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/winmdexp-exe-windows-runtime-metadata-export-tool.md)为名称"value"的返回值。By default, [Winmdexp.exe (Windows Runtime Metadata Export Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/winmdexp-exe-windows-runtime-metadata-export-tool.md) gives the return value the name "value". 当使用中的组件[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]以 JavaScript 编写，可以使用此名称可检索返回值的应用程序。When you use a component in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app written in JavaScript, you can use this name to retrieve the return value. 例如，假设一个组件定义一个方法包含返回值和第二个`out`参数 (`ByRef`参数在 Visual Basic 中的属性):For example, suppose a component defines a method that has a return value and two `out` parameters (`ByRef` parameters with the attribute in Visual Basic): ```csharp public static int ComputeAverage([ReadOnlyArray()] int[] input, out int minValue, out int maxValue) { … } ``` ```vb Public Shared Function ComputeAverage( _ ByVal input As Integer, _ ByRef minValue As Integer, _ ByRef maxValue As Integer) As Integer … End Function ``` 当从 JavaScript 中调用函数时，你可以通过其默认名称来访问返回的值 (`value`):When you call the function from JavaScript, you can access the return value by its default name (`value`): ```javascript var data = [5, 13, 23, 37]; var results = SampleComponent.TestStuff.computeAverage(data); var formattedResults = "Min=" + results.minValue + ", Avg=" + results.value + ", Max=" + results.maxValue; ``` 如果你已有一个名为"value"参数，则必须为返回的值不同的名称。 或者，你可能只是想要使用一个更有意义的名称 （例如"平均值"在此示例中）。Or you might simply want to use a more meaningful name (such as "average" in this example). 应用属性到你的方法，并指定新名称。Apply the attribute to your method and specify a new name. ```csharp [return: ReturnValueName("average")] public static int ComputeAverage([ReadOnlyArray()] int[] input, out int minValue, out int maxValue) { … } ``` ```vb Public Shared Function ComputeAverage( _ ByVal input As Integer, _ ByRef minValue As Integer, _ ByRef maxValue As Integer) _ As Integer … End Function ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

span.span: The name of the return value.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定返回值的名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, and specifies the name of the return value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 组件中为方法返回值指定的名称。

span.span: Gets the name that was specified for the return value of a method in a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component.
The name of the method's return value.
